gnu.awt.virtual
Class VirtualComponentPeer

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--gnu.awt.virtual.VirtualComponentPeer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.peer.ComponentPeer
Direct Known Subclasses:
VirtualFramePeer, VirtualLightweightPeer
public abstract class VirtualComponentPeer
extends Object
implements java.awt.peer.ComponentPeer

Base class for virtual component peers. Satisfies the requirements for AWT peers without actually displaying anything (hence, they are virtual) or by delegating to the parent component, under the assumption is that somewhere up in the hierarchy there is a parent who can produce a display.
